sqlMap.sql: select t1.SET_NO as SET_NO, t1.SET_NAME as SET_NAME, t1.FARM_USE as FARM_USE, t1.SERVER_MAKE as SERVER_MAKE, t1.SERVER_DELETE as SERVER_DELETE, t1.SERVER_OPERATE as SERVER_OPERATE, t1.SERVICE_MAKE as SERVICE_MAKE, t1.SERVICE_DELETE as SERVICE_DELETE, t1.SERVICE_OPERATE as SERVICE_OPERATE, t1.LB_MAKE as LB_MAKE, t1.LB_DELETE as LB_DELETE, t1.LB_OPERATE as LB_OPERATE from AUTHORITY_SET t1
select count(*) as COUNT from AUTHORITY_SET t1
sqlMap.insert: insert into AUTHORITY_SET ( SET_NO, SET_NAME, FARM_USE, SERVER_MAKE, SERVER_DELETE, SERVER_OPERATE, SERVICE_MAKE, SERVICE_DELETE, SERVICE_OPERATE, LB_MAKE, LB_DELETE, LB_OPERATE ) values ( #setNo#, #setName#, #farmUse#, #serverMake#, #serverDelete#, #serverOperate#, #serviceMake#, #serviceDelete#, #serviceOperate#, #lbMake#, #lbDelete#, #lbOperate# )

insert into AUTHORITY_SET ( SET_NO, SET_NAME, FARM_USE, SERVER_MAKE, SERVER_DELETE, SERVER_OPERATE, SERVICE_MAKE, SERVICE_DELETE, SERVICE_OPERATE, LB_MAKE, LB_DELETE, LB_OPERATE ) values ( #setNo#, #setName#, #farmUse#, #serverMake#, #serverDelete#, #serverOperate#, #serviceMake#, #serviceDelete#, #serviceOperate#, #lbMake#, #lbDelete#, #lbOperate# )
select last_insert_id()
sqlMap.update: update AUTHORITY_SET set SET_NAME = #setName#, FARM_USE = #farmUse#, SERVER_MAKE = #serverMake#, SERVER_DELETE = #serverDelete#, SERVER_OPERATE = #serverOperate#, SERVICE_MAKE = #serviceMake#, SERVICE_DELETE = #serviceDelete#, SERVICE_OPERATE = #serviceOperate#, LB_MAKE = #lbMake#, LB_DELETE = #lbDelete#, LB_OPERATE = #lbOperate# where SET_NO = #setNo#
